Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_INNERLABEL_REPORT' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_INNERLABEL_REPORT] GO CREATE VIEW v_INNERLABEL_REPORT AS SELECT DISTINCT t.CompanyID, t.ShipmentPlanID, t.InventoryID, attr.Description AS Customer, p.UsrSOCustomerPO AS CustomerOrderNbr, t.LotSerialNbr, ProdLine, PlannedShipDate, PlannedShipQty, 1 AS StartLabelNbr, m.EndLabelNbr, t.ProdOrdID, CASE WHEN (t.QtytoProd - (NowNbr * CAST(c.Value AS decimal))) / CAST(c.Value AS decimal) > 0 then CAST(c.Value as int) ELSE CAST(CAST(c.Value AS decimal) + (t.QtytoProd - (NowNbr * CAST(c.Value AS decimal))) % CAST(c.Value AS decimal) as int) END AS Container FROM LumShipmentPlan t INNER JOIN InventoryItem i ON t.CompanyID = i.CompanyID AND t.InventoryID = i.InventoryID LEFT JOIN CSAnswers c ON t.CompanyID = c.CompanyID AND i.NoteID = c.RefNoteID AND c.AttributeID = 'QTYSBOX' LEFT JOIN CSAttributeDetail attr ON t.CompanyID = attr.CompanyID AND attr.AttributeID = 'ENDC' AND attr.ValueID = t.Customer INNER JOIN AMProdItem p on t.CompanyID = p.CompanyID AND t.ProdOrdID = p.ProdOrdID INNER JOIN ( select CompanyID, ShipmentPlanID, ProdOrdID, max(ISNULL(EndLabelNbr,1)) as EndLabelNbr from LumShipmentPlan group by CompanyID, ShipmentPlanID,ProdOrdID) m on m.CompanyID = t.CompanyID and m.ShipmentPlanID = t.ShipmentPlanID and m.ProdOrdID = t.ProdOrdID CROSS JOIN( SELECT DISTINCT NUMBER AS NowNbr FROM master.dbo.spt_values WHERE name IS NULL ) NumberPool WHERE NowNbr BETWEEN 1 AND t.QtytoProd / CAST(ISNULL(c.Value,1) as decimal) + 1
